entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:20 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 12:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -24.2°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
